<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|direct_entity}}: The entity that was the direct cause of the damage.
*** {{nbt inherit/conditions/entity}}
** {{nbt|compound|source_entity}}: Checks the entity that was the source of the damage (for example: The skeleton that shot the arrow).
*** {{nbt inherit/conditions/entity}}
** {{nbt|boolean|is_direct}}: If {{cd|true}}, checks if the damage is direct (i.e. the direct and source entities are the same), if {{cd|false}} checks if the damage is not direct. Omitted to not check.
** {{nbt|list|tags}}: An array of objects containing [[Damage type tag (Java Edition)|damage type tags]] that the type of the damage should be included in.
*** {{nbt|compound}}: An object representing a damage type tag.
**** {{nbt|string|id}}: The resource location of the tag.
**** {{nbt|boolean|expected}}: Whether this tag should be present on the damage type.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
